mapper.sql: id, goods_id, user_id, number, delete_flag, create_time
mapper.select: select c.*, (select goods_title from inn_goods where c.goods_id=id)as goodsTitle, (select promotion_price from inn_goods where c.goods_id=id)as promotionPrice, (select substring_index( small_picture,",",1) from inn_goods where c.goods_id=id)as smallPicture, (select weight from inn_goods where c.goods_id=id)as weight from inn_cart c where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
